page.title: 08CAISTOR COUNCIL MEETINGS
page.content: The May meeting of{Caistor Town {Council}discussed: Repairing of faulty street lamps: Future of Caistor Hospital:{ Litter: Locating the bus timetable:Tree trimming in West Brook Grove: Improvement of Church Paths: Improvement of road signs: Tree planting:{ The public toilets in the {market place. At the meeting held on{4th.June,}the {toilet block}was again a{major issue.} Other items discussed were:Kelsey Rd.street lighting;Grass cutting;VE Celebrations;Twinning with a French town(proposal defeated because of the cost);Appleby's bus timetable;Best kept town competition and planning applications.
